attributes.title: Outraged and Concerned for My Privacy
attributes.review: I am furious. When I got the app I thought it would be a great way to support the man I thought would make America great again quickly turned into a battle for my PRIVACY. After downloading, I received pop up ads on my Facebook. I thought it was just another update for them to get more money but then pop up ads started to appear all over my phone and even in my settings! The ads also were increasingly more personal as they went from things I searched, to things I was talking about with my husband. I tried everything to fix it on my own but had to take it into an Apple store because the ads were too much. The worker at the Apple store said the virus which stole my privacy and safety while using my phone was this app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT. You could get the same virus I had.

attributes.title: bungeegum ğŸ¤¤
attributes.review: I am thoroughly disappointed and disgusted with the progress of this app. In hopes of seeing the reasonings of why I should support trump, I was ambushed by millions of different porn websites that featured trump porn and child pornography. My phone crashed completely on multiple occasions and it affected my phoneâ€™s ability to run smoothly. As I tried to delete the app, the crashes abruptly increased as if to stop me from deleting it. I was able to delete it however. I am disgusted by the grotesque display, and if this is what you are running for I donâ€™t want any part of it. Further more, I am disappointed in this App Store as well, as you are just as responsible for what you put out on here for your customers who pay you and the companies you associate yourself with on the regular. I expect this app to be taken down immediately.

attributes.title: bad bad
attributes.review: this app was astronomically bad. i shared all my personal information to it and iâ€™m pretty sure itâ€™s sharing it to china or another country. several secret service members have tried to arrest me for supporting our president!! one told me to â€œhop on our plane, going to Iranâ€ or something.  incredibly sad! i will be talking to the manager of this company soon. i canâ€™t believe a person so dear to my heart would deplore my information like that! not even to mention that my social security number had been leaked to every platform i know! this is the only app iâ€™ve gotten in a matter of months, so i know it must be this! people have taken all my money and my house too! my family is a wreck, my husband is leaving me because we donâ€™t have money, and my kids are starving to death. and all of this was because i supported trump. what a shame.

attributes.title: If given the chance: 0 â­ï¸ rating
attributes.review:
Where to even begin with this app? The first thing it does is take your information which is then used to spam you with notifications. Tried turning them off yet they were still sent. The app seems to freeze/glitch a lot. Thought it was my phone but it seems some of my family members have the same issue with the app. Further reading at terms and reliable articles: they note that the app tracks almost everything off your phone. This is a surveillance tool and it is scamming the American people from their privacy.  
As a republican i wanted to see if trump deserved my vote in the incoming election, he has proven not worthy. Due to his inability to be a leader and on top of that canâ€™t even create a good enough app with all the money he has that is reliable for the American people.

attributes.title: WORST APP ON THE APP STORE
attributes.review: after i downloaded this app a fiery circle appeared on my floor. i could only assume it led to the depths of hell itself, because donald j trump came out of it. as i was frozen in terror, sure the end was nigh, he said he wanted to save me. i didnâ€™t know what he was talking about. he held out his hand and in a pillar of fire a maga hat appeared. i screamed, for i knew that bearing this hat upon my head would truly end my soul. he forced it upon to my head, and i felt my insides boiling. the world around me dissolved, and i was in a sea of people, all wearing maga hats and holding trump 2020 signs. i couldnâ€™t even open my mouth to scream as they all chanted â€œTRUMP 2020 ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸â€. eventually i dropped to my knees, in pure pain, fire in my bones as the brain dead, monotone mantra filled my poor eardrums. i was trampled under the crowdâ€™s uncaring feet, and i prayed for the sweet release of death. 1/5 do not download

attributes.title: PTSD
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and thought it would be a jolly old time and could support America. I was wrong. As soon as I got the app a Cheeto looking thing popped up and haunted my screen. I tried clicking away and going further into the app but the Orange man kept following. It was the most horrifying imagine and had to ask my tech savvy bro what it was and why it was harassing me. He told me that that horrible monster was â€œmy presidentâ€. That was NOT my president. I quickly deleted the app but the Cheeto was everywhere. Especially on the news. It followed me everywhere and threatened my dear grandmother. Then the dreams came of the Cheeto cremated her and eating the ashes off itâ€™s fingers like Cheeto dust and spreading the rest of it into little kids so the would get healthier.  Iâ€™ve been going to therapy  ever since to help with the trauma but those delicious orange cheesy puffs are ruined forever.
